forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. South southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. South wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the early hours of Sunday unfurl over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle breath of calmness lingers in the air, promising a day that embraces the sun. The overnight skies remain mostly clear, with the coolness of 46 degrees weaving its way through the city’s quiet streets. As the sun rises, it beckons with the allure of a day painted in warm hues, peaking at around 60 degrees before drifting slightly lower in the gentle afternoon light. The southward winds, tender and whispering, flirt lightly between 2 and 10 miles per hour, suggesting an effortless mingling as the day unfolds.

The landscape appears untroubled and clean, devoid of fog’s characteristic embrace, offering a crisp visibility that invites long walks along the waterfront or leisurely brunches in the sun-drenched corners of your favorite café. A light jacket or layers would serve well, allowing for ease of movement and comfort as the day shifts from its cool morning beginnings into the pleasant warmth of midday. As the sun ascends, consider a stroll to explore the hidden gems of the neighborhood—perhaps a visit to an independent bookstore, a small gallery tucked away in an alley, or simply a seat on a sunlit terrace where the world can drift by. Engaging with the easy pace around you, while savoring warm beverages or catching up with a friend, could turn this day into a memory worth cherishing.
